name: WKURLSchemeHandler
desc: A protocol for loading resources with URL schemes that WebKit doesn't handle.

items.name: func webView(WKWebView, start: WKURLSchemeTask)
items.desc: Asks your handler to begin loading the data for the specified resource.

items.name: func webView(WKWebView, stop: WKURLSchemeTask)
items.desc: Asks your handler to stop loading the data for the specified resource.
